data.title: How to get to Barwoutswaarder in Woerden by bus, train or light rail?
data.meta_description: Moovit helps you to find the best routes to Barwoutswaarder using public transit and gives you step by step directions with updated schedule times for bus, train or light rail in Woerden.
data.text:
Traveling around Woerden has never been so easy. See step by step directions as you travel to any attraction, street or major public transit station. View bus and train schedules, arrival times, service alerts and detailed routes on a map, so you know exactly how to get to anywhere in Woerden.

When traveling to any destination around Woerden use Moovit's Live Directions with Get Off Notifications to know exactly where and how far to walk, how long to wait for your line, and how many stops are left. Moovit will alert you when it's time to get off â€” no need to constantly re-check whether yours is the next stop.

Wondering how to use public transit in Woerden or how to pay for public transit in Woerden? Moovit public transit app can help you navigate your way with public transit easily, and at minimum cost. It includes public transit fees, ticket prices, and costs. Looking for a map of Woerden public transit lines? Moovit public transit app shows all public transit maps in Woerden with all bus, train or light rail routes and stops on an interactive map.

Woerden has 3 transit type(s), including: bus, train or light rail, operated by several transit agencies, including NS, NS International, GVB, GVB, GVB, GVB, U-OV, U-OV, Overal, HTM, R-net, RET, RET, De Lijn and Connexxion
